GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix use-after-free bug of struct nilfs_root

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.148 by commit 21ee3cffed8fbabb669435facfd576ba18ac8652. For more details please see the references link.
